name: Novaflare
description: Jingliu, Blade, Silver Wolf, and Kafka have received enhancements. Try them out to earn rewards!
introduction:
◆ Novaflare Details ◆
● After characters are enhanced, their abilities, Traces, and Eidolon effects may change.
● After enhancement, both existing and newly obtained characters default to their enhanced state.
 ● You can switch between pre-enhanced and enhanced states on the "Character Details" > "Character Enhancement" page.
